Articles.Content:
I fill megatiger's universe with trash.

My trash dimension.

I employ an army of space butlers to clean up this mess.

My hoity-toity rich-guy dimension.

I induce an ultra-singularity which consumes everything in the universe. It proceeds to implode on itself and create a new universe.

I find a hill and claim it.

My hill.

I construct a mini-city on the hill.

My hill.

After the next election, I'm elected Mayor by a margin of eleven votes.

My Capitol Hill.

I don't really care about any of the invasions - I'm a universe, who am I to say who can and cannot plant their flags on any of my quadrillions of planets? 

Meanwhile, I use my humanoid external body to instigate a Communist revolution and overthrow the corrupt capitalist mayor. The city-hill's government is reformed as a democratized state with the means of production controlled by the people. Ã¢ËœÂ­

Everyone's hill.

my unoverse invades the orignal univerese with marines. (not space marines, royal marines)

my megaverese/englands hill

I stage a coup to overthrow the current government.

My Megaverse/Englands Hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-01-21T01:40:08Z" title="01/21/2015 01:40  AM" data-short="9 yr">January 21, 2015</time> by Maximus97**
  
Government, not goverment. Duh.

I trigger a thermonuclear detonation on the hill.

My crater.

I do your typical textbook positive/negative space / vertical inversion over the crater, turning it inside-out and forming it into a hill. I also lock it inside a bubble of retro-directional planar space, ensuring that anyone who tries to walk towards it ends up going the other way without realizing what happened. 

My hill, although nobody quite knows where it is and I'm not telling.

> 
> I do your typical textbook positive/negative space / vertical inversion over the crater, turning it inside-out and forming it into a hill. I also lock it inside a bubble of retro-directional planar space, ensuring that anyone who tries to walk towards it ends up going the other way without realizing what happened. 
> My hill, although nobody quite knows where it is and I'm not telling.

I construct a larger hill, which inadvertently buries the previous hill in the process. My larger hill.

With no defenses built, the hill falls quickly to the glorious KV-2!

My hill over a hill.

Wow, is this still going? ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

I engage physics, and the hill above the hill crashes down.

I now have an even larger hill.

My even larger larger hill. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

My space-inversion bubble is still keeping my hill safe, despite it being buried under a larger hill. 

I enlarge the bubble, shredding the larger hill above me into hard gamma rays and relativistic particles from the tidal stress from the expanding boundary. 

My hill in the middle of a radioactive crater in the middle of a blasted wasteland.

I don my Power Armor suit and inject some Rad-X so I can safely traverse the radiation.

My hill.

A random .50 AP shot fires and knocks you unconcious.

We take your power armor and the hill.

My hill.

I build giant curved radiation mirrors (out of unobtanium) and use them to vaporize General Rarity's head.

My headless corpse with power armor on the hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-01-21T20:33:22Z" title="01/21/2015 08:33  PM" data-short="9 yr">January 21, 2015</time> by Tery215**

I throw a flashbang onto the hill. While disoriented I shoot Tery with a Glock to the head.

I promptly erect some 20mm quads and PaK 35 AT guns hoping to defend my hill with two corpses and power armor.

After respawning at my last bed, I don my Chinese Stealth Armor and silently sneak behind the lines, taking out the guards and the leader of the hill.

My hill with big guns, a bunch of corpses, and power armor.

You die from radiation. Congrats on not equipping that power armour.

I send in literal strips of muscles to defend the hill. No life, just muscle strips.

My hill.

A stolen Object 297 mounted with a flamethrower cooks the muscles, and something climbs out and knicks the corpses, power armor, and weapons. They find a home in the hill.

My hill with graves and a vault of cool stuff.

I drop a tungsten rod on it which penetrates the hill and the bunker, folding it in half with its insane kinetic energy, and crushing everything and everyone inside.

My hill with a hole in it and crushed bunker underneath it.

I lead an army of dwarves under the hill. They stay there, causing insomnia for everyone above.

My hill.

Dragons and dwarves don't mix well. Too much greed.

My hill now. Those dwarves won't be coming back anytime soon.

I plant my flag on your hill.

My hill.
